page.title: 12Inhabitant of Stony Houghton
page.content: Mr. X lives in a stone cottage in Stony Houghton.He lives with his wife and daughter.He enjoys living in Stony Houghton but it can get lonely.He said there was no vandalism but during the 1984 miners Strike, the local farmers suffered from sheep rustling.His leisure hours are spent gardening and looking after his goat.His garden is very large.The cottage was small but nice.There was a gas fire,a television,two settees,a rocking chair,three bookshelves and a small table,under which slept his dog.The kitchen was tiny.
